text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here
Yes its me bob
Join me for learning street with bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host.
Welcome to our Phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet. Isn’t that cool?
They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!
Please welcome Mr. S who loves to S S S sing!
I love a S S song to sing along.
A S S S song a nice and peppy song.
What makes a day bright and sets in the night?
It’s the S S sun the warm and lovely sun.
What can melt in the sun playing in it is so much fun
S S snow, pure and white snow.
When it snows turn up the heat wear a jacket and socks on your feet
S S socks your warm woolen socks.
What is that I hear sounds like hissing to my ear
I think it’s a snake a S S S S snake.
What’s that sliding by my side, It’s black, shiny really wide
A S S seal a smart and slippery seal.
I have a couch that is so soft I keep it upstairs in my loft
I call it a sofa a S S sofa
Take two slices of bread some peanut butter to spread
Lets make a sandwich a S S sandwich.
I can sit on it all day long and sing my happy little song
It’s my favourite swing S S swing.
Up and down it can go a little high, a little low
A seesaw a S S seesaw.
As you can all see S is the best, isn’t he?
So judges do you say, Mr.S has made our day?
Superb!
Special!
Sincere!
Sensational!
Stunning
Thank you, Mr. S, and Judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Sayonara!
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
